Summary: point of light that moved erratically
divs: Sighting Detailsi arrived home from a movie.i stopped my car and got out and happened to gaze up.i saw a red and whitish pinpoint light.i thought it was moving across the sky,like a typical man made craft.then i saw it squiggle,then move right,move left and reassume a line trajectory across the night skies.this is the third time i witnessed something i simply cannot explain.i called the local p.d. and the local airforce base and they had no reports of test craft in the area.i do not drink or consume drugs.i am not crazy.i just want to know why!can you help me?after what i saw i got spooked and went inside.i have no idea what is was.
